View Javadoc
1   package com.quorum.tessera.thirdparty;
2   
3   import com.quorum.tessera.api.model.*;
4   import com.quorum.tessera.core.api.ServiceFactory;
5   import com.quorum.tessera.transaction.TransactionManager;
6   import io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation;
7   import io.swagger.annotations.ApiParam;
8   import io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse;
9   import io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses;
10  import org.slf4j.Logger;
11  import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
12  
13  import javax.validation.Valid;
14  import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
15  import javax.ws.rs.*;
16  import javax.ws.rs.core.Response;
17  import javax.ws.rs.core.Response.Status;
18  import java.util.Objects;
19  
20  import static javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType.*;
21  
22  /** Provides endpoints for dealing with raw transactions */
23  @Path("/")
24  public class RawTransactionResource {
25  
26      private static final Logger LOGGER = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RawTransactionResource.class);
27  
28      private final TransactionManager delegate;
29  
30      public RawTransactionResource() {
31          this(ServiceFactory.create().transactionManager());
32      }
33  
34      public RawTransactionResource(TransactionManager delegate) {
35          this.delegate = Objects.requireNonNull(delegate);
36      }
37  
38      @ApiOperation(value = "Store raw private transaction payload", produces = "Encrypted payload")
39      @ApiResponses({
40          @ApiResponse(code = 200, response = StoreRawResponse.class, message = "Store response"),
41          @ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "For unknown sender")
42      })
43      @POST
44      @Path("storeraw")
45      @Consumes(APPLICATION_JSON)
46      @Produces(APPLICATION_JSON)
47      public Response store(
48              @ApiParam(name = "storeRawRequest", required = true) @NotNull @Valid
49                      final StoreRawRequest storeRawRequest) {
50  
51          final StoreRawResponse response = delegate.store(storeRawRequest);
52  
53          return Response.status(Status.OK).type(APPLICATION_JSON).entity(response).build();
54      }
55  }
